text: [Ja'quʙ] Guft: «Hargiz uro ʙo sumo naxoham firistod, to ʙo man ʙa nomi Alloh taolo pajmoni ustuvore ʙiʙanded, ki hatman uro nazdi man ʙozmeovared, magar on ki giriftor saved [va hec jak nacot najoʙed]. Pas, cun [ahdu] pajmoni ustuvori xes ʙa u dodand, [Ja'quʙ] guft: «Alloh taolo ʙar on ci meguem, [guvohu] nigahʙon ast»
